basics.label: General Liability Claim Representative
basics.summary: Claims Representative who is highly motivated, success driven with several years experience in the insurance industry.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Recognized for continued outstanding customer service - nominated for In-Synch Award. Successfully determined coverage and communicated with insured based on application of policy information, facts, and allegations of each case. Aggressively investigated, evaluated, reserved, and negotiated assigned claims in accordance with Best Practices. Organized workflow to maintain efficiency and productivity. Recognized for successfully identifying resources for activities required to properly investigate claims involving Subrogation, Risk Control, and fraud. Managed litigated claims, maintained accounts with business partners to ensure and sustain quality results.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitored the performance of a team of eight automobile claim representatives, using tools and techniques to improve performance timely and effectively. Communicated expectations and held unit meetings. Organized workflow to maintain efficiency and productivity. Coached and developed technically and professionally in order to improve business results and maintain positive morale in the office. Proactively understood, planned, and communicated the objectives and philosophy of the company, unit goals, expectations, and changes in workflows. Analyzed team results independently, created, and implemented appropriate action plans to achieve needed results.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Determined coverage, supervised the investigation of automobile accidents over the telephone and on site to determine liability. Directed auto claims representatives to pay property damage claims once liability had been determined adverse. Managed uninsured/underinsured motorist property/injury claims. Reported claims to special investigations and completed reports as to the outcome of these investigations. Supervised litigated claims with the support of company legal counsel.
highlights: Awarded at home work privileges due to superior time management skills.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Directly responsible for investigating general liability claims, such as slip and falls, municipality claims involving wrongful death allegations. Required to work closely with clients to complete the investigation of claims, determine liability, and evaluate settlements. Required to understand services offered to assist in outside sales presentations. Supervised litigated claims together with Risk Management General Counsel. Managed multimillion-dollar settlements together with Risk Management partners and Defense Counsel.
